QuestData.Title: Town-In-A-Box: Under Attack
QuestData.Description: $n, you have to defend us!$B$BI had the eggheads deploy the town's cannon defenses, but it seems like there's an unlimited supply of these Oomlot warriors!$B$BGet your behind into one of those B.C. Eliminators and eliminate the pygmy threat to the town!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use a B.C. Eliminator to defeat 30 Oomlot Warriors.
QuestData.CompletionText: That's not enough, hon. Can you take care of more of them?
QuestData.RewardText: Okay, I think that's good enough for now, but they took a bunch of the townsfolk captive.$B$BWe're going to have to take the fight to them!
